page.title: 08Religion
page.content: There are 15 Chapels and Churches within our area.They are St.David's Church,Llanllwchaiarn Parish Church, All Saints Church,Newtown Baptist Chapel, Rhydfelin Baptist Chapel, Wesleyan Methodist Church, Catholic Church, United Reformed Church,Society of Friends, Plymouth Bretheren,Jehovah Witnesses, Spirtualists,Capel Coffa'r Annibynwyr. (Welsh)Bethel Presbyterian Church in Wales(Welsh),Crescent Presbyterian Church in Wales(English). All services are held at 10:30 a.m. and 6:00p.m.,except at Rhydfelin Chapel.Where there is only one service at 2.30p.m.. Llanllwchaiarn,Saint David's and All saints share the same vicar,while at present Newtown Baptist Chapel,Capel Coffa,United Reformed and Rhydfelin have no minister.Bethel and Crescent share a minister.All Chapels buildings date from the 18th and 19th
